import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; //import { Radar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import playersArray from "../../globals/skrallgaming/players" import placings from "../../globals/skrallgaming/placings" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/createThornament.css" export default function CreateThornament(){ const [ groupMaxPlayers, setGroupMaxPlayers ] = useState(4) const [ groupStage, setGroupStage ] = useState(true) const [ teams, setTeams ] = useState([]) const [ p1, setP1 ] = useState() const [ p2, setP2 ] = useState() const { players, setPlayers } = usePlayers() const registerTeam = () =>{ if (!p1 || !p2) return let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.push([p1, p2]) setTeams(arr); } useState(() => {if (!players?.lenght) setPlayers(playersArray)}, []) return <>
